title: You've been disconnected from chat
body:
I can access everything except the PVP stuff. I've tried flushing my DNS and used the hextech repair tool. Nothing helped.

The client was working just fine 10 minutes ago. I logged out then logged back in and  now I get this error.

The account isn't restricted in any way.

How do I fix it?

replies.body: Weird that would happen after only relogging. Something might have been changed in the background, as you need to have specific ports open to be able to access the chat servers (they are separate from the matchmaking servers). Check to make sure everything is setup properly in your network settings following [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq8).
